CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n polymers |
| PffBB-10 polymers |
| PffBB-16 polymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n polymers |
| PffBB-10 polymers |
| PffBB-16 polymers |

Explanation:
The paragraph mentions "PffBB-n polymers" as the main material entity, and specifically mentions "PffBB-10 polymers" and "PffBB-16 polymers" as different types or variations of the PffBB-n polymers. Therefore, these are also considered material entities. Other entities such as "Figure 1" and "size of the alkyl side chains" do not clearly refer to material names and can be disregarded.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Figure 1 , the aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers also enhanced with an increase in the size of the alkyl side chains ( from n = 10 to 16 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers |
| size of the alkyl side chains |
| from n = 10 to 16 |

In this paragraph, "aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers" and "size of the alkyl side chains" are the property values mentioned. The value "from n = 10 to 16" describes the change in the size of the alkyl side chains.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| aggregation ability / strength of PffBB-n polymers |
| size of alkyl side chains (from n = 10 to 16) |

In this revised table, only the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property are included. "Size of alkyl side chains" can be considered a material property as it describes a characteristic feature of the PffBB-n polymers. The phrase "from n = 10 to 16" is included as it specifies the range of change in the size of the alkyl side chains.
